Name: Donakhol
description:
Donakhol is hardworking, active and helpful. She was born in 1968 in Tursunzade, Tajikistan. She has a big family â”€ married and the caring mother of seven.

For more than a decade, she's farmed and earns a good income. Her earnings pay daily expenses.

She's asking for a loan to buy compost and minerals for her land to improve it. Donakhol hopes for your support because with your help she can reap a good harvest.
